Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 15ft, Average Damage: 19 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 15 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Tail, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 20ft, Average Damage: 17 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Dragon can use its Frightful Presence.  It then makes 3 attacks, one with its Bite and two with its Claws
Other Actions.Action 2: Frightful Presence, Each creature that is aware of the Dragon must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the Dragon
Other Actions.Action 3: Acid Breath, The Dragon exhales acid in a line.  Each creature caught in the line takes an Average 63 Acid damage
Other Actions.Action 4: Slowing Breath, The Dragon exhales gas in a cone.  Each creature caught in the area makes a Constitution saving throw, failing they can not use reactions, its speed is halved and it can not make more than one attack on its turn.  The creature can use an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both
Other Actions.Action 5: Change Shape, The Dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast, or back into its true form

Abilities.Ability 1: Legendary Resistance, If the Dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead

Legendary Actions.Action 1: Detect, The Dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check
Legendary Actions.Action 2: Tail Attack, The Dragon makes a Tail attack
Legendary Actions.Action 3: Wing Attack, The Dragon beats its wings.  Nearby creatures make a Dexterity saving throw, failing they take an Average 15 Bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.  The Dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed

Lair Actions.Action 1: Stone spikes erupt from the ground.  This effect seems almost identical to the spike growth spell
Lair Actions.Action 2: A 10ft square space turns into deep mud.  Creatures caught in the area when the mud appears must succeed a Dexterity saving throw or become restrained by the mud
